overview: The story of a love triangle among Anggun (Paramitha Rusady), Rian (Rano Karno) and Cindy (Ayu Azhari). When Anggun returns to his hometown of  Padang, he becomes a member of a rally committee. This is where he meets Rian and his girlfriend Cindy. This love story is actually a vehicle for exposing and promoting the scenery of West Sumatra for tourism purposes.
title: Selembut Wajah Anggun
